Title: Study hard to become capable and dexterous, revolutionary technologies enable great ambition and talent
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: The woman holds a papercut with the characters 喜喜 - Double Happiness. She stands behind a washing machine produced by the 8-3 Agricultural Tools Factory (三八农具厂) - 8-3 meaning 8 March, International Women's Day.
